string.text:
Totally normal Desert Eagle. Nothing to see here. It might be in a bullpup configuration with a UTG Combat D Grip, might shoot full auto and might be chambered in 50 BMG, but all of this is just rumors.

 %c[ui_gray_2]ATTACHMENTS:
 %c[d_purple] • %c[ui_gray_2] all Picatinny scopes (when using MAS)
 %c[d_purple] • %c[ui_gray_2] compatible suppressor (salvo 12)
 %c[ui_gray_2]COMPATIBLE MOD KITS:\N %c[d_purple] • %c[ui_gray_2] Specialized weapon mod kit

Another totally normal Desert Eagle. Nothing to see here. It might be in a bullpup configuration with a Surefire Grip with integrated blue Laser from NCStar, might shoot full auto and might be chambered in 50 BMG, but all of this is just rumors.
 
 %c[ui_gray_2]ATTACHMENTS: 
 %c[d_purple] • %c[ui_gray_2] all Picatinny scopes (when using MAS)
 %c[d_purple] • %c[ui_gray_2] compatible suppressor (salvo 12)
